Episodes.Title: Joan Rivers; David Carradine; Scott Baio; Teri Polo
Episodes.Plot: Joan Rivers talks about an encounter with an angry ghost; Scott Baio recounts a story involving unresolved issues with his deceased father; Teri Polo remembers a childhood experience; and David Carradine has an encounter with his wife's dead husband.

Episodes.Title: Barry Williams; Debi Mazar; Greg Grunberg; Sammy Hagar
Episodes.Plot: Barry Williams has an unusual experience during a memorial service for his father; Debi Mazar has an encounter with a ghost when she moves into a friend's home; Sammy Hagar is visited by Van Halen's deceased manager; and Greg Grunberg encounters a ghost.

Episodes.Title: Carrie Fisher; Rue McClanahan; John Waters; Federico Castelluccio
Episodes.Plot: Carrie Fisher recalls an experience that happened after her friend died in her bed; John Waters recounts a scary memory from the 1950s; Federico Castelluccio believes a presence was in his workshop with him watching him paint; and Rue McClanahan recalls a friend's deathbed experience.

Episodes.Title: Tom Arnold; Dee Snider; Carnie Wilson; Nia Long
Episodes.Plot: Tom Arnold recalls an incident from his teens involving a pipe organ; Dee Snider remembers receiving a message from his murdered brother-in-law; Carnie Wilson relates how her sister introduced her to the spirit world; and Nia Long remembers an experience surrounding the death of her grandfather.

Episodes.Title: Lisa Rinna, Jeffrey Ross, Vincent Curatola, Illeana Douglas
Episodes.Plot: Lisa Rinna recalls a ghost haunting; Vincent Curatola remembers an experience involving his mother; Jeffrey Ross recounts a haunting; and Illeana Douglas recalls an experience involving a new apartment.

Episodes.Title: Carnie Wilson; Eric Roberts; Elisabeth Rohm; C. Thomas Howell
Episodes.Plot: Carnie Wilson meets the ghost of a 19th-century barber; Eric Roberts has an out-of-body experience following a car wreck; Elisabeth Rohm sees an apparition; and C. Thomas Howell has an encounter in an abandoned hotel.

Episodes.Title: Justine Bateman; Traci Lords; Jay Thomas; James Kyson Lee
Episodes.Plot: A spirit makes Justine Bateman's life merrier; Jay Thomas mistakenly uses a tombstone for a home renovation; Traci Lords has a run-in with a miner's ghost; James Kyson Lee opens the door to a nightmare when he reads a ghost magazine.

Episodes.Title: Ali Landry, Gina Gershon, Ernie Hudson, Kelly Carlson, Anson Williams
Episodes.Plot: Anson Williams gets help from the beyond after a car accident; Kelly Carlson is bullied by violent spirits; Gina Gershon experiences a presence in her college dorm; Ernie Hudson stays at a haunted hotel.

Episodes.Title: Morgan Fairchild, Lili Taylor, John Salley, Vincent Curatola
Episodes.Plot: Morgan Fairchild is abused by a spirit; a stranger comes to John Salley's aid; Lili Taylor hears unexplained noises; Vincent Curatola communicates with his dead father.
